ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe I use claws and Saeiny s Claw (Dagger, 6dam 18dly, AC 10, Int +3) I haven t gotten the BoFL yet but I am wanting one, it will be primary hand so that it
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe I use claws and Saeiny's Claw (Dagger, 6dam 18dly, AC 10, Int +3)

I haven't gotten the BoFL yet but I am wanting one, it will be primary hand
so that it gets the dex bonus for procs.

Speaking of bunuses:

The strength and dex bonus are not applied to your offhand. HOWEVER the
LEVEL based Damage bonus is.

Level based bonus seems to be (Bonus=(level-25))
I've heard level-20 but haven't seen results to back that up yet.

Right now I can hit for up to 22dmg with my Bladed Thulian Claws and have
hit for 23 with my Saeiny's claw (in my offhand).

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath


> Well I have to disagree. I thought the same thing until a guildmate gave
me
> one. The 5/18 is a very good ratio, slightly better than the claws. And
> the proc isn't bad if you know when to stop using the weapon. I use this
in
> my offhand with claws in my primary and I swear I never stop swinging. If
> we get pulls of more than one, I always unequip it and put an obsidian
shard
> or some other weapon in my secondary. So it isn't that bad of a weapon if
> you just remember when not to use it.
>
>
> You will be disappointed I fear. The proc is a level 8 wizard spell
that
> does 28 points of AoE damage centered on the user. Can you say
> demezmerizing mega-taunt? I thought you could.
>
> At least its great if you get surrounded by a horde of moss snakes you
> couldn't Lullaby while doing some testing to prove just that.
>
> Kitasi
